name: Blackjack at Carrot
description:
Welcome to the Blackjack tables at Carrot!

These tables only takes fictional money. We will not stop you from counting cards. So, a great way to practice basic strategy and card counting or just have a relaxed gambling session without real money involved. There are two tables available from start with different rules. It is possible to change the rules of existing tables as well as creating new tables. Further customization is available at the table (Hand totals on screen, dealer speed etc.).

Features:
  • Play up to 4 players locally
  • Customizable table rules
  • Customizable playing experience
  • Jazz music (of course possible to turn off if you prefer something else)
